nodes.text: Who are you to disturb these wilds?

options.text: I am ${ascean.name}. To whom am I speaking with?
That's not how this works, friend. Who are?
I better set your entire forest on fire in self defense.

nodes.text: Well you seem certain of yourself, very well, I am ${article} ${enemy.name}. And you are?

options.text: That's better, you needn't know my name. [Reach for your weapon]

nodes.text: Perhaps I was hasty in my threat, you may pass.

options.text: That's more like it, glad we're on the same page kek.
